text: (And those who believed) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and did good works) acts of obedience such none knows them except Allah (are made to enter Gardens beneath which) beneath its trees and habitations (rivers) of wine, water, honey and milk (flow, therein abiding by permission of their Lord) by the command of their Lord, (their greeting) their favour (therein) in Paradise: (Peace!) when they meet therein, they greet one another.
